amendment.description: To set the effective date of the section.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2591 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2591 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2388. (consideration: S1195, CR S1206; text: CR S1199) To set the effective date of the section.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2591 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2388.
